Package ca.corefacility.bioinformatics.irida.repositories.joins.project

Interface ProjectSampleJoinRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:

extends org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<ProjectSampleJoin,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<ProjectSampleJoin>

      • calculateCoverageForSamplesInProject

        @Query("SELECT ps.sample.id, ROUND(SUM(qc.totalBases)/ps.project.genomeSize) FROM ProjectSampleJoin ps join SampleSequencingObjectJoin sso on sso.sample = ps.sample join CoverageQCEntry qc on qc.sequencingObject = sso.sequencingObject where ps.project=?1 and ps.sample.id in ?2 group by ps.sample.id, ps.project.genomeSize")
java.util.List<javax.persistence.Tuple> calculateCoverageForSamplesInProject​(Project project,
                                                                             java.util.List<java.lang.Long> sampleIds)
        Calculate the coverage for a list of Samples within a Project.
        Parameters:
        project - Project to get sample coverage for.
        sampleIds - Sample ids
        Returns:
        A List of Tuples with first entry as the sample id and second entry as the coverage
